types.description: Mark 15 numbers to bet in Lotofácil. Win by hitting 11, 12, 13, 14 or 15 numbers. There are a lot of chances to win, and now you can bet from wherever you are!
Mark 6 of 60 numbers available. Win by hitting 6, 5 or 4. There are to weekly draws for you to bet and cheer to become millionarie
Mark 5 of 80 numbers available. Win by hitting 5, 4, 3 ou 2 numbers drawn. There are six weekly draws and six chances to win
Mark as many numbers as you want up to a maximum of 50. Win by hitting 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20 or none of the 20 numbers drawn.
